result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher L Thom was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: In the event of non-payment of outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.
Order for DNA given to the defendant in court. Must report to Barron County Jail on October 25, 2016, between 1:00 and 5:00 PM, to submit DNA sample.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Christopher L Thom in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  John Michael O'Boyle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
THIS COVERS 16CM162 & 16CM248.

16CM162 - State moves to amend to 947.01(1). Court grants amendment. Defendant pleads guilty. Court accepts the plea and finds the Defendant guilty.
Court relates and orders: Costs.

16CM248 - State moves to dismiss and read-in. Court grants

Order for DNA given to the defendant in court. Report to Barron County Jail today, October 25, 2016, between 1:00 and 5:00 PM.

ADDRESS INFO for Christopher L Thom
Current: 16757 W. County Rd DD, Birchwood, WI 54817 United States  (Effective: 09-30-2016)
Prior: 115 East Gates Street, Rice Lake, WI 54868
Plea hearing on October 25, 2016 at 11:00 am.

(clerked by RW)
Defendant Christopher L Thom in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  John Michael O'Boyle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
THIS COVERS 16CM248 & 16CM162. Defendant claims to be competent today. State does not object. Court finds Defendant to be competent. 
16CM248 - Not guilty pleas entered. File to Branch III for scheduling. 
16CM162 - Set for JT 1/3/16 at 8:00 AM. 

Minutes to JA for JT notice.
Jury trial - 12 person on January 3, 2017 at 08:00 am.
with cover sheet for confidential records

Defendant Christopher L Thom in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. THIS COVERS 16CM162 AND 16CM248. Defense relates regarding Defendant's competency. Court orders competency exam by the WI forensic unit. Handwritten secondary address of Defendant's parents given to DA's office in Court.  Competency hearing scheduled for September 13, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-537-1191. 

Must have no contact with Heidi S.

Defendant Christopher L Thom in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  John Michael O'Boyle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
